data.title: Deciphering
data.statement:
You're a secret agent tasked with creating an algorithm to automatically decipher the Caesar cipher used by the evil organization named WHOOPS.
It's a classic Caesar cipher, meaning each letter is transformed into a different ASCII character with a constant offset, except the spaces, which are represented by the symbol {{{}}.
You are able to do it not only because you're the best agent but also because they finish each message with "Agent" followed by a letter representing them so, for example {{Agent A}}.

testCases.title: Validator 1
testCases.testOut: I know it does not make sense to talk about a micro Agent T

testCases.title: Test 2
testCases.testOut: This is Jerry the head of WHOOPS I am talking alone because I am kind of senile but I am going to dominate the world Agent J

testCases.title: Validator 2
testCases.testOut: This is still Jerry I know the ants are watching me Agent J

testCases.title: Test 3
testCases.testOut: The old man has gone crazy again but well orders are orders and I cannot pass on the new gadgets world domination here we come Agent C

testCases.title: Validator 3
testCases.testOut: You know the reason he is not getting better is because you are playing along Agent S

testCases.title: Test 4
testCases.testOut: I do not care as long as there is action and more importantly cuties Agent A

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testOut: I am not paid enough for this shit do what you want I am not going to try to stop you all Agent S

data.inputDescription: <<Line 1>>: the secret [[message]] you have to decipher.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You're a secret agent tasked with creating an algorithm to automatically decipher the Caesar cipher used by the evil organization named WHOOPS.
It's a classic Caesar cipher, meaning each letter is transformed into a different ASCII character with a constant offset, except the spaces, which are represented by the symbol {.
You are able to do it not only because you're the best agent but also because they finish each message with "Agent" followed by a letter representing them so, for example Agent A.
Input
Line 1: the secret message you have to decipher.
Output
Line 1: the uncyphered message.
Constraints
0 <=length of message<=256
Example
Input
DUcd{]YSb_{1WU^d{:
Output
Test micro Agent J
